code: import{createSlice}from'@reduxjs/toolkit';var initialState={value:{gid:'',lid:'',iid:'',name:'',type:''}};var itemSlice=createSlice({name:'activeItem',initialState:initialState,reducers:{setItem:function setItem(state,action){state.value=action.payload;},resetItem:function resetItem(state){state.value=initialState.value;}}});var _itemSlice$actions=itemSlice.actions,setItem=_itemSlice$actions.setItem,resetItem=_itemSlice$actions.resetItem;export{setItem,resetItem};export var selectItem=function selectItem(state){return state.activeItem.value;};export default itemSlice.reducer;
